SELECT ROWNUM, B.* FROM (SELECT BO.BOARD_NO , BO.BOARD_TITLE , BO.USER_NO , RPAD(SUBSTR(M.USER_NAME, 1, 1), 4, '*') AS "USER_NAME" , TO_CHAR(BO.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "ENROLL_DATE" , BI.ORIGIN_NAME , BI.CHANGE_NAME , ( SELECT COUNT (*) FROM THUMB WHERE BOARD_NO = BO.BOARD_NO ) AS THUMB_COUNT FROM BOARD BO, BOARDIMG BI, MEMBER M WHERE BO.BOARD_NO = BI.BOARD_NO (+) AND BO.USER_NO = M.USER_NO (+) AND BO.STATUS = 'Y' AND BI.THUMBNAIL = 'Y' ORDER BY THUMB_COUNT DESC) B WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4
